title: Fulmen Foundry Catalog Entry
description: Schema for individual catalog entries in the foundry reference data registry. v1.1.0 adds weight classification, default_inclusion, and feature_group for library feature gates.

catalog_name.description: Unique identifier for the catalog (lowercase, hyphenated)

schema_path.description: Path to JSON Schema for catalog entries

config_path.description: Path to YAML catalog data file

weight.description: Dependency footprint for consuming this catalog. light = serde-class only; heavy = requires regex, glob, or other significant deps

default_inclusion.description: Whether catalog is included in default/standard builds. false = opt-in only

feature_group.description: Feature gate group for library implementations (e.g., foundry-core, foundry-patterns)

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the catalog

added_version.description: Crucible version when catalog was added
